title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Bear Safety
body: Bear Safety         Brown bear in Dyea NPS photo  Brown Bears (Ursa arctos) and Black Bears (Ursa americanus) are frequenlty seen along the Chilkoot Trail. It is the responsibility of hikers to properly store food and know how to safety travel in bear country. The park recommends that all hikers watch the 20 minute bear safety film at the Chilkoot Trail Center. Learn more!
